sections.general:
ASSISTANT STORE MANAGER OF OPERATIONS AND HUMAN RESOURCES
Highlights
SKILLS / STRENGTHS Computer
Peoplesoft, Kronos payroll management system, Microsoft Word, Excel, Access, and PowerPoint, entry level HTML Professional
Excellent communicator, motivator, and decision maker
Strong analytical and problem solving skills
Ability to handle multiple task and lead to completion
Strong public speaker
Accomplishments

Civic Club Scholarship 2008
Kohl's Territory Finalist for Manager in Training competition 2012
